channel.title: github on 宇宙的空虚
channel.description: Recent content in github on 宇宙的空虚

item.title: Hugo创建博客
item.description: mac下实践 hugo create blog 安装hugo myblogprj % brew install hugo myblogprj % hugo version myblogprj % brew reinstall hugo 建立博客根目录myblog，添加theme，运行起来 myblogprj % hugo new site myblog myblogprj % cd myblog myblog % mkdir themes myblog
